service.name: HttpFileUpload
service.attribute: MM=MM CS=CS PS=PS QM=QM NOTE=NOTE NOTICE=NOTICE MATNR=MATNR MAIL=MAIL FILE=FILE AP=AP OCR=OCR BSMR=BSMR

object.attribute: 보수 사업계획 정보 집계 일일 배치 프로그램

service.name: SqlMapManagerAction
service.attribute: SELECT TABNAME TABLE_NAME FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TABSCHEMA = ?
SELECT VIEWNAME TABLE_NAME FROM SYSCAT.VIEWS WHERE VIEWSCHEMA = ?
SELECT DISTINCT TABSCHEMA USER_NAME FROM SYSCAT.TABLES
